Description:
Affordable Opportunity
First impressions are lasting as is the lifetime of enjoyment offered by this lovely home. Perfect for the first home buyer, astute investor or downsizer the home offers a generously-proportioned layout flowing over a single level for effortless living which includes 3 bedrooms, master with a walk in robe and ensuite whilst other are fitted with built ins, formal lounge room, spacious open plan kitchen lounge & dining, central bathroom and a sizeable yard.
Complete with ducted heating, SS appliances, dishwasher, a remote controlled double garage with internal access, wide side access potential and more. Its definitely a must see.
Private Sale.
PHOTO I.D REQUIRED AT ALL OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS.

Description:
OPEN CANCELLED - CONTACT AGENT
Stockdale & Leggo Real Estate proudly presents 38 Upton Circle Derrimut, a property that will quite simply just blow you away. Raising the bar in luxury living and offering the ultimate lifestyle this home is highlighted by the most magnificent outdoor entertainment area you will see that easily closes off from the outside, a soundproof theatre room that can also be used as a formal lounge or 4th bedroom and a first class interior with upgrades and extras at every turn. Masterfully designed the magnificent kitchen featuring stone benches, glass splashback and 900mm appliances overlooks the dining, main living and outdoor living area forming a huge indoor / outdoor zone when entertaining. Sleeping quarters comprise spacious bedrooms, the luxurious master offering a large WIR and ensuite. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, feature fireplace and additional cooling system in the theatre room/4th Bedroom, WIFI controlled designer lighting, range hood and gas line for BBQ in alfresco, sprinkler system to the gorgeous front and rear gardens, video doorbell, security cameras, double remote garage with internal access and double driveway accommodating off street parking for 4 vehicles. Completing this package is a prime location with all amenities literally a few steps away. Something special awaits one lucky purchaser.

Description:
Space for the whole family
Perfectly located in this sought after location of Derrimut is this spacious family home. Step inside the double door entrance and be impressed by what this home has to offer. Comprising of a large open study, formal lounge, hostess kitchen overlooking the informal living areas. Upstairs offers a family retreat, spacious master bedroom with a balcony, walk in robes and ensuite. 3 additional bedrooms all have built in robes and are serviced by a central bathroom. Features include: double garage with internal access, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceiling, stone bench tops and much more. All this within a short distance to all local amenities including: public transport, parklands, school, childcare centre and easy access to Western Ring Road. Call today to organise a personalised inspection.

Description:
Urgent Sale
In Room Auction: Thursday 10th August 2017 at 7:00pm at our office located at Ray White Caroline Springs, Shop 8/234 Caroline Springs Boulevard, Caroline Springs
Dont miss out on the perfect home situated only minutes walk to Derrimut Primary School and YMCA Derrimut early learning centre, Derrimut Community Centre and a short drive to shopping centres, public transport, schools and across the road from Balmoral Park, you search ends here. Featuring three bedrooms plus a study or fourth bedroom, centrally located bathroom, main with ensuite and walk in robe, all other bedrooms with built in robes, large kitchen with plenty of storage space and overlooking the dining area, front formal lounge room plus private theatre room on entrance and spacious laundry.
Built with low maintenance yards surrounding, ducted heating, lounge that can be easily reconverted back into a garage, outside undercover pergola area and much more, dont miss this opportunity. Don't miss out on this Auction unless sold prior.

Warm & Inviting
Whether you are a first home buyer or looking to expand your portfolio you can't go past this well presented home. Situated in this highly sought after area with easy access to the local shopping centre, transport & freeways. Comprising of open plan living incorporating a generous modern kitchen with S/S appliances overlooking the dining and family areas, 3 good size bedrooms (master with full ensuite & WIR), a sparkling central bathroom and a double garage. Features include ducted heating ,split system cooling , dishwasher, high ceilings, modern light fittings and a good sized allotment. Located within a few minutes walk to Child Care Centre, Derrimut Primary School and St Lawrence Primary School.
Don't delay..... Inspect today!

Description:
Opulent Presence Meets Superior Stature
This majestic home has all the features to accommodate the most fastidious buyer. Superbly equipped throughout with 4 bedrooms (en suite, WIR and retreat to master) plus study.
Offering formal lounge, opulent hallway/entry, open plan family - kitchen and meals area, butlers pantry, rumpus room/secondary lounge, double garage with remote control roller door and undercover outdoor alfresco entertaining area.
Features include ducted heating, split system cooling, down-lights, alarm system, 2 bathrooms in total, 9ft ceilings, quality timber flooring, cesar stone bench tops and multiple drive thru access points.
This home stands proud on a sensational corner allotment of 655m2 approx. and is set in a quiet yet very popular pocket of Derrimut. Set in a pristine high class location among other quality homes and within seconds of shopping strips, bus stops, schools and parks.
DOUGLAS KAY REAL ESTATE

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
This brilliant residence is highlighted by the most magnificent outdoor entertainment area you will find comprising of a huge deck that provides the perfect setting for all occasions in the tranquility and peaceful surrounds of lovely gardens and feature bamboo fencing. With two zones you have the choice of relaxing with a drink on the outdoor couches, alfresco dining on those warm summer evenings or utilise the entire space when hosting the largest of family gatherings. Moving inside you are greeted with an open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances that overlooks the dining and main living area. Sleeping quarters comprise 3 bedrooms, the master with huge WIR and ensuite and the remaining 2 bedrooms with BIRs serviced by a sleek, modern central bathroom. Another great feature is the extra wide driveway that in conjunction with the double remote garage provides off street parking for up to 5 vehicles or park your cars in the driveway and convert the garage to a kids rumpus or additional living space. To the rear of the garage you will find a private courtyard and garden that can also double as storage space for a boat or trailer by adding a gate for side access or rear roller door to garage. Other features include a separate lounge room, open study that can easily be converted into a 4th bedroom, ducted heating, 2 split systems, high ceilings, tinted windows, frameless shower screens and low maintenance gardens. A few short steps from parkland, transport and schools complete this wonderful package otherwise known as 12 Sinclair Green Derrimut.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
By renowned builder Metricon this lovely Derrimut residence boasts an absolute prime location with the Derrimut Village, Deer Park train station, golf course, magnificent Balmoral Park, schools and transport all within easy walking distance. The home comprises an open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry that overlooks the expansive dining and main living space. Moving outside you are greeted with a superb two level decked entertaining area privately screened off by mature hedging and bamboo fencing. Pull up a stool on the upper level for that morning coffee or to wind down with that chilled glass of wine or beer on those warm summer evenings whilst the larger lower level offers the perfect setting for alfresco dining when a family feast or BBQ is in order. This area then spills into the large rear yard that offers a safe and secure place for the kids to play and entertain themselves. Sleeping quarters are highlighted by the enormous master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite and 2 additional bedrooms, one with a WIR and the other a BIR serviced by the modern main bathroom. A bonus open study also provides flexibility for buyers as it can easily be converted into a 4th bedroom. Other features include a separate lounge to the front of the property, contemporary flooring, ducted heating, landscaped mature gardens, a double garage and gorgeous aspect from inside with most windows providing lovely garden views. All this on a large corner block of approximately 570sqm land with potential side access to the rear with the addition of a second crossover (STCA ).

Description:
Impressive Scale and Luxury
Located in one of Derrimut's most desired locations, this loved family home has everything you need from a home and more.
Sitting on approx. 688m2 of land and demanding your attention from the front with its striking and contemporary facade, you'll be hard pressed to find a home that has space and style of this calibre.
Contemporary in design and functionality, this stunning family home has glorious presentation which will captivate you with open spaces, flexible living arrangements and care free life style.
The endless living areas provide a vast array of living options and include formal lounge, large study, open meals / family area and separate rumpus room. Immaculate modern kitchen features dishwasher, stainless steel appliances, spacious pantry and plenty of storage options. Flowing outdoor alfresco areas are perfect for the avid entertainer and will provide year round comfort as they progress into the fully landscaped garden. Gorgeous master bedroom seamlessly through to the walk-in robe, stunning Ensuite and access to the large balcony with stunning park and city views. Upstairs also boasts 3 great size bedrooms with access to the stylish central bathroom and separate toilet, and the fourth larger bedroom and retreat with direct access to the balcony.
Additional features include; ducted heating, evaporative cooling, and an extra split system downstairs, stone bench tops throughout the house, floating floorboards, high ceilings, and an abundance of natural light throughout. Double garage with remote access and immaculate gardens complete this already remarkable property.
Enjoying unlimited access to the estate facilities with schools, parks, shopping centres and freeway access all only moments away, this home is one that must be inspected for those looking for space, land and style.
***PHOTO IDENTIFICATION IS REQUIRED FOR ALL INSPECTIONS***

Description:
Exceptional Style and Family Versatility
An outstanding location with easy access to area's key lifestyle attractions finds this single-level sensation on a wide block of land that's sure to capture your attention with its free-flowing design, long list of features and terrific indoor/outdoor entertaining spaces. Beautifully-appointed, the home's cleverly zoned interior comprises four bedrooms (large master with WIR and private ensuite), stylish main bathroom and separate WC. Dual living zones include a spacious central lounge with gas-log fireplace leading through to the open-plan living/dining area enhanced by a quality kitchen with stainless steel appliances (including dishwasher) and walk-in pantry. Other highlights include ducted heating and evaporative cooling, alarm system, stone-top vanities, integrated audio, LED lighting, solar/gas hot water, plus a fabulous al-fresco style entertaining deck and wide backyard with established gardens, double garage (remote-controlled) via exposed aggregate driveway. Walking distance to Robinsons Road buses, it's also close to popular schools, Balmoral Park, easy access to major shopping precincts, Deer Park Station and Western Freeway. Land approx 668sqm. Impressive family living!

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Looking for your dream home? Imagine a location with parkland being practically your front yard and a vibrant shopping village just a few further steps away. A lifestyle where recreation, schools, transport, cafes, restaurants and retail were literally metres from your doorstep and the CBD within a short easy commute. To compliment such a prized position you would want a modern, stylish home you could just move straight into with all the hard work already completed. But where do you find all of this without the hefty price tag you ask. My response is at 21 Joy Avenue Derrimut. This brilliant residence comprises 4 bedrooms of enormous proportions, the luxurious master with double door entry, WIR and ensuite. Serviced by the lovely central bathroom are the remaining 3 bedrooms with BIRs , with bedroom 4 easily being able to be opened up and converted into a second living space if you wish. Open plan in design the superb kitchen featuring stone benches, 900mm stainless steel appliances and glass splashback overlooks the dining and living space that leads out to a paved outdoor entertainment area and great sized rear yard offering a safe and secure place for kids to play. Other features include soaring high ceilings, ducted heating, brand new carpets, brand new window furnishings, freshly painted, downlights, landscaped gardens and double remote garage with internal access. An affordable opportunity to indulge in a life of total convenience awaits one lucky purchaser.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
We all know location is key both for the lifestyle a prime position can offer and most importantly the enormous future capital growth assured by the right location that will always be in high demand. Only a select few homes in the estate face magnificent Balmoral Park, this stretch of properties being the suburbs most sought after, and home to Derrimuts record price and only million dollar plus residential sale. Now the rare opportunity has arisen to purchase this gorgeous Porter Davis ex display home that has been enhanced by the recent addition of a new kitchen, new laundry and refurbished bathrooms transforming it into one of Derrimuts finest homes, a home so special that it truly compliments such a prestigious address. Sleeping accommodation comprises 4 bedrooms, master with glorious park views, dual WIRs and twin vanity, double shower ensuite and a separate study with double doors that can also be utilised as a 5th bedroom or perfect nursery as it is adjacent to the master suite. The cutting edge kitchen with thick stones benches and WIP is encompassed by an endless list of living and entertaining zones including meals, family, rumpus, formal dining and lounge. By opening up the bi fold door all these areas intertwine beautifully with the brilliant decked alfresco area and massive rear yard making this home an entertainers paradise. Another standout feature is the extra oversized remote garage with bonus studio complete with running water, heating and cooling which allows you to run a business from home with great exposure from Windsor Boulevard and the masses of people that use Balmoral Park for recreation. Other extras include high ceilings, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, designer lighting, quality window furnishings including plantation shutters, alarm connected to house and garage, solar panel system,double exposed aggregate driveway and so much more. Whether your interest is in indulging in the luxurious touches and refinements of this great home, hosting the biggest and best family gatherings, enjoying the recreation and wide open spaces of the park across the road, the convenience of working from home, investing in this prime location for capital growth or having all amenities practically at your doorstep, this property offers everything you could ever wish for and more.

Description:
SOLD BY STEVE JUSUP & NICK MAKROGLOU
Providing great street appeal, this residences striking façade will immediately impress but it is upon entering that your appreciation for its magnificent condition and presentation will come to the fore. Sleeping quarters comprise master bedroom with WIR and oversize shower ensuite and 2 additional bedrooms with BIRs serviced by the lovely central bathroom. A large open study provides options for buyers as this space can be utilised as a home office, kids rumpus or for buyers that require an extra bedroom it can easily be converted into a 4th bedroom. The home is highlighted by a sensational kitchen featuring stone benches, glass splashback, stainless steel appliances including 900mm cooktop and range hood which overlooks the dining and main living area. Moving outside you are greeted with a large pergola, perfect for entertaining family and friends on those special occasions or for alfresco dining on those warm summer evenings, a magnificent cubby house the kids will love, a powered shed for the tradesperson and beautiful gardens with mature fruit trees. Other features include a separate lounge, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, landscaped low maintenance front and rear gardens, quality window furnishings including roman blinds and blockouts, double remote garage with internal access and wide double driveway. With everything already done for you just move in, relax and enjoy not only what this great home has to offer but also a location of total convenience with schools, parkland, community centre and transport are all just a few steps around the corner.

Description:
OPEN CANCELLED - UNDER CONTRACT
Sale Type: Private Sale
The instant appeal of this Porter Davis immaculate home that skilfully blends the modern with the contemporary is matched by a location nearby to parks, schools and shops. Set on a generous allotment of some 612sqm with a generous backyard it consists of formal lounge off the entry hall, rumpus/theatre room, enormous open plan meals, living & kitchen (with a butlers pantry, 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, glass splashback and stone tops) expanding out via timber bi-fold doors to an alfresco grand entertainers dream about complete with a merbau deck, built in BBQ and ceiling fan. Its 4 bedrooms + study are all of a generous size, master room with his/hers WIRs & deluxe ensuite finished with a large shower and double vanity, others rooms with built ins and serviced by the main bathroom. Adorned with a lush of quality and extras including ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, high ceilings, 2 car remote garage with internal and drive through access, garden shed, solar panels and more. The grandness flows through to the yard with a cubbyhouse where theres plenty of room for kids to play and mingle. There has been no compromising in the up doing of this quality contemporary living home. Be sure to inspect to avoid missing out.
PHOTO I.D. REQUIRED AT ALL OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Beautifully presented this magnificent Derrimut residence delivers in all aspects of luxury living. The home is highlighted by a sleek cutting edge kitchen with thick stone benches, 900mm appliances, glass splashback, dishwasher and double fridge space that overlooks the dining and expansive main living area, two luxurious bathrooms with stone benches and oversize frameless showers and a magnificent decked outdoor entertainment area that can be closed off with quality café blinds providing outdoor living year round. These upgrades and special touches continue throughout the home with double door entry into an impressive extra wide entrance hall, high ceilings, gorgeous contemporary flooring, plantation shutters, a massive WIR to master suite and mirrored BIRs to the additional bedrooms. Other features include huge separate lounge, laundry with direct access to outside, downlights, alarm, video intercom, gas provisions to alfresco, low maintenance front and rear gardens with designated vegetable patch, water tank, an abundance of storage options including linen cupboard in home, numerous cupboards and cabinets in the garage and outdoor storage shed. Completing the home is a double remote garage with internal access and a double driveway and crossover providing off street parking for a multitude of vehicles. The opportunity to purchase a home that has been thoughtfully designed, lovingly maintained and with upgrades where it really matters awaits one lucky purchaser.

Description:
It's truly love at first sight!
At first glance, you'll be sure to fall in love! Step inside and you'll be greeted by the soaring high ceilings and classy hardwood flooring throughout. Beautifully maintained, this immaculate home will welcome families of all sizes. In the heart of the home, awaits a quality kitchen with stone benches, stainless steel appliances and dishwasher which overlook the meals area and lounge.
Completing the home are 3 spacious bedrooms with BIR's, master comprising of full en-suite and walk in robe, all serviced by a sparking central bathroom. Step outside and you'll find a quality deck that leads to a lovely garden to entertain guest all year round! Features include ducted heating, downlights, split system and internal access from the double garage just to name a few. Conveniently situated in a prime location, a stone throw away from the Derrimut Village shopping complex, easy access to the Western Ring Road, parklands, primary schools and public transport.

Description:
First Class and Quality Location!
This stylish family home is set in a prime position, located only 18km (approx.) from Melbourne's CBD.
Neutral tones frame the flowing and practical floorplan, recently updated with new carpets and freshly painted throughout. Sleeping quarters comprise of four fabulous sized bedrooms all fitted with built in robes, master with walk in robe and private ensuite. Spacious kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, ample bench space and plenty of storage options. Set on a generous 571m2 allotment (approx.) with drive through access to the secure rear yard.
Within close proximity to the local shopping precinct, just a short stroll to St Lawrence Primary School and Bothwell Green Reserve and just minutes to the Western Freeway.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
First home buyers, owner occupiers and investors dont miss this amazing opportunity to secure a gorgeous Porter Davis residence that offers an affordable opportunity into the booming Derrimut market. Highlighted by a fantastic floorplan, the home comprises 3 spacious bedrooms, master with WIR and oversize shower ensuite, 2 living areas where the lounge can easily be converted into a 4th bedroom providing flexibility in design, and a lovely open plan kitchen /dining/ living area that flows beautifully to the outdoor entertainment area and great size rear yard. Other features include a superb main bathroom, large laundry with direct access to outside, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, stainless steel appliances, feature walls, low maintenance gardens, large storage shed, double remote garage with internal and rear access, double exposed aggregate driveway and so much more. Whether you are a first home buyer, planning to owner occupy or looking for your next stress free investment this cute and cosy abode should be high on your list.
